price: 1. Waxaa xurmo weyneeya oo (xumaan ka) hufa Alle waxa ku sugan samooyinka iyo waxa ku sugan arlada. Waana Adkaadaha Sare, Xakiimka ah.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
